string.text: The stash contained a short report on how Fang and I infiltrated the underground galleries below the sarcophagus, and found a suspicious-looking door. Fang said he'd make a decoder for the electronic lock for our next visit. But hordes of Monolith patrols turned up there and we had to run for our lives. I found his decoder in the stash, and also directions for finding the door again. However, the area has become extremely dangerous. We had to crawl over the destroyed reactor to avoid going under the sarcophagus, because that's where all the Monolith seem to be now...
